alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:45AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Calcasieu River near White Oak Park ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Kinder, White Oak Park...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 945 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Goos Ferry Road becomes impassable. Calcasieu River from the Saltwater Barrier to the parish line may be closed to recreational boat traffic. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:35 AM CST Tuesday was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 4.0 Tue 8 am CST 4.0 4.0 3.9 &&
